joint_involvement.justification: Based on the presence of multiple large joints involved (e.g., elbows, hips, knees).

serology.justification: Both RF and anti-CCP are negative.

acute_phase.justification: CRP is positive with a value of 114 mg/L. ESR is unknown but VHS was given as 27 mm/h which is considered abnormal.

duration.justification: No mention of duration or any other context that would justify additional points.

treatment_context.justification: There is no indication of treatment with DMARDs or biologics, so the strength of treatment is none.

classification_rationale: The patient has a total score of 1 out of 7 according to ACR/EULAR criteria. With serology (0 points) and acute phase response (1 point), the final label is RA− due to the presence of negative RF, negative anti-CCP, and no mention of treatment with DMARDs or biologics.
